name: Automaton Escape
description:
A defective line of robots go to self destruct, but one robot gets struck by lightning which in turn gives it control of itself and tries to escape the robot factory that it is in. Help this robot battle through several security robots that want to shut it off.

Controls are explained in game.

This game was programmed in Unity and the assets were drawn using Pixilart and a few were drawn using Microsoft PowerPoint.

Check out the Music!

Main Menu Song:  Lasers (newgrounds.com)

Braunbot (Level 7 Song): Juggernaut (loop) (newgrounds.com)

Technomancer (Level 14 Song): antimatter (newgrounds.com)

Mothership (Level 21 Song): Heliodrome (newgrounds.com)

Nanobot Entity Song (Level 28 Song): Hyperactive Robot Dance (newgrounds.com)

Colossus Guardian (Level 34 Song): The Colossus (newgrounds.com)

End Credits Song: .12/03/20 (wip) (newgrounds.com)

This is the first game that I have ever created.

I hope you enjoy it!
